== Main inclusion report for beagle ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' 
  Highly popular desktop search tool shipping in SuSE and future Fedora.
  libbeagle can be integrated into our Gnome for improved search functionality, esp in Nautilus.
# ''Security:'' No security issues reported. Indexing "daemon" runs as a normal user.
# ''Quality assurance:''  
** Very active upstream sponsored by Novell. Quick responses to bugs.
# ''Standards compliance:'' FHS and Debian Policy met.
# ''Dependencies:'' Depends are in main with the exception of gtk-sharp2 (already approved and should be re-seeded shortly), and gmime2.1.

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: approved
